#4.1
Fast Track
Select the skill(s) you want to learn.  This lesson will include ONLY the skills that you select.  

You want to be able to:
     recognize Debugger features
     start the Debugger
     set breakpoints 
     step through code
     watch and modify variables
     list where all global variable are defined and used
     determine which function sets a variable
     list where all classes are defined and used
     locate the view for Multiprocess debugging
Are you finished selecting?
